title: SRAM Patent Suggests Next-Gen Zipp Wheels Will Be Real-Time Smart
content:
Real-time sensing of tire pressure, composite health, wheel speed, lean angle, yaw and road condition could all be possible with the "Smart Wheel Accessory" described in the latest patent from SRAM.

Read the full article at SRAM Patent Suggests Next-Gen Zipp Wheels Will Be Real-Time Smart on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
